name: Campfire (applied AI company)
headline: Building the next generation of games and consumer apps powered by AI
description:
Campfire is building the next generation of games powered by AI. Our first product is a game with LLM-based AI agents at the heart of the gameplay experience along with the tools to realize these worlds. 

Advent of AI is going to change entertainment more than 3D rendering or the internet. We're following in foot steps of Pixar and Epic Games in creating a paradigm shifting company at the intersection of creativity and technology.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:generative-ai; industry:consumer; industry:b2b; industry:gaming; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Sina Zargaran, Founder
founders.description: 6+ years of B2B SaaS product management & go-to-market strategy across FinTech, InsurTech, PropTech.

generated_description:
**Campfire: Pioneering the Future of AI-Driven Entertainment**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, Campfire operates out of San Francisco with a lean team of five dedicated employees. The company's mission is ambitious yet straightforward: to build the next generation of games and consumer apps powered by artificial intelligence.

Initially focused on the gaming sector, Campfire is developing games that leverage large language model (LLM) technology to create engaging AI-driven gameplay experiences. They're essentially crafting interactive worlds where AI agents are not just add-ons—they're the heart of the gameplay itself. This approach is set to revolutionize entertainment, perhaps even more profoundly than the advent of 3D rendering or the internet did.

Campfire draws inspiration from industry titans like Pixar and Epic Games, aiming to become a paradigm-shifting entity at the intersection of creativity and technology. Their vision encapsulates the belief that AI will facilitate deeper storytelling, more immersive experiences, and innovative tools for developers.

A glimpse into their current projects reveals an array of intriguing offerings. First up is **Sprites.AI**, their flagship AI engine designed for creating agents in games and consumer applications. This suite provides tools for creative developers to foster the next wave of interactive media, starting with conversational agents powered by LLMs, but with plans to expand into image, video, and audio capabilities.

Their other noteworthy endeavor is **Cozy Friends**, described as “Animal Crossing with AI NPCs.” This project presents a glimpse into the potential of AI in simulation gaming, blending companionship and interaction seamlessly.

Looking ahead, Campfire has exciting announcements on the horizon: **Aurora**, a supportive companion AI, and **Qualia**, which promises to immerse users in a universe of personal expression.

At Campfire, the belief is simple: with the right tools, developers can create extraordinary experiences that were once thought impossible. As they work towards enabling the next generation of interactive media with their cutting-edge technologies, they position themselves as not just participants but leaders in a revolutionary space.

For more details, you can check out their website at [Campfire](https://campfire.to).
